channel.title: Newbie Question
channel.description:
Ok here's a newbie coder question, I'm trying to figure out how to set up a server. :)
I set up the no-ip, but I don't know how to make it so I can connect to my server through the no-ip.
Probably an easy to answer question, I looked around and didn't find anything on it.
Thank for anyone's help.
EDIT: When I run the server it says "Starting server on 0.0.0.0:43594"
I think it should say (Or what I think I want it to say) "Starting server on FenamScape.no-ip.org:43594"

item.title: Newbie Question
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

[quote=“Fenam, post:4, topic:92640”]Do I download this from No-IP.com?

I’m kinda confused :P[/quote]

Yup. www.no-ip.com. Then sign up, go through the process… Easy.

Read full topic

item.title: Newbie Question
item.dc:creator: @Fenam Fenam
item.description:
@Fenam wrote:

Nevermind, I found where to download it. Thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Newbie Question
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

To change the text what it says in runserver.bat, just search for the current one and change it.

Read full topic

item.title: Newbie Question
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Once you’ve downloaded something named ‘No-IP DUC’, you have to open it, update you’re domain’s and refresh the list, everyso often. Once you have the DUC open, just double-click runserver.bat and away you go.

Btw, when you’re connecting to you’re own server, don’t use any IP. You can just login through the Local IP since you’re the host.

Read full topic
